doc.title: Actions | Fight For 1.5! - Fridays For Future - Sign our Promise and join an action!
doc.excerpt: 5 years since commiting to 1.5 degrees Celsius with the Paris Agreement but too little has been done. We need action. We need you to #FightFor1Point5, sign our Promise and join our local worldwide actions against climate change.

main.head: Actions around the world
HOME | About | promise | Webinars | Share
main.p: Find all strikes and actions around December 11th on this global map!
main.head: Help with the Map
main.p: > Click on the pin to find time and place for the strike, and, if they have indicated a contact or social media channels to follow the organizer of that strike/action.
> To see all other FFF strikes and actions, please visit our main map!
